languages.text: {n}Тяжко быть почвой под пятами колосса, но таков удел тех, кто хочет проложить исполину {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g} путь в победоносное будущее. Разум чувствует единение с прочими, кто устилает тропу, упиваясь благостью ноши.{/n}

{n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Тяжко быть почвой под пятами колосса, но таков удел тех, кто хочет проложить исполину {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Империума{/g} путь в победоносное будущее. Разум чувствует единение с прочими, кто устилает тропу, упиваясь благостью ноши.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The burden of being the ground beneath His feet may be great, but it is the only fate for those who live to pave the road to a triumphant future for the Imperium's towering Protector. The mind can sense a connection to all others who build this road, revering the righteousness of their burden.{/n}

{n}The burden of being the ground beneath His feet may be great, but it is the only fate for those who live to pave the road to a triumphant future for the Imperium's towering Protector. The mind can sense a connection to all others who build this road, revering the righteousness of their burden.{/n}

{n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the great Protector of the Imperium. It is a heavy burden to know one's fate, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose.{/n}

{n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the great Protector of the Imperium. It is a heavy burden to know one's fate, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose.{/n}

{n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

{n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'innombrables fidèles devront se sacrifier pour ouvrir la voie qui mènera le formidable Protecteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} au triomphe. Lourd est le fardeau de ceux qui rampent à Ses pieds, mais rien n'apporte plus de gloire que servir l'union sacrée nécessaire à une cause aussi juste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'innombrables fidèles devront se sacrifier pour ouvrir la voie qui mènera le formidable Protecteur de l'{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} au triomphe. Lourd est le fardeau de ceux qui rampent à Ses pieds, mais rien n'apporte plus de gloire que servir l'union sacrée nécessaire à une cause aussi juste.{/n}

languages.text: {n}El sacrificio de muchos crea un camino triunfal para el titán que es {mf|el|la} Protector{mf||a} del {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. Ser el suelo que pisan Sus pies constituye una pesada carga, pero es glorioso servir unidos a un propósito tan noble.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El sacrificio de muchos crea un camino triunfal para el titán que es {mf|el|la} Protector{mf||a} del {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. Ser el suelo que pisan Sus pies constituye una pesada carga, pero es glorioso servir unidos a un propósito tan noble.{/n}

languages.text: {n}为了确保通往胜利的道路，许多人都为{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}的伟大守护者献出了生命。无论对什么人而言，侍奉神皇的职责都是个沉重的负担，但能为这样的正义使命而献身，无疑是光荣之举。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}为了确保通往胜利的道路，许多人都为{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}的伟大守护者献出了生命。无论对什么人而言，侍奉神皇的职责都是个沉重的负担，但能为这样的正义使命而献身，无疑是光荣之举。{/n}

languages.text: {n}多くの犠牲が{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}の守護者たるタイタンの勝利の未来への道を切り開く。主の足元で地盤となることは大きな重責だが、このような正義の目的に一丸となって奉仕できるのは誇らしいことだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}多くの犠牲が{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}帝国{/g}の守護者たるタイタンの勝利の未来への道を切り開く。主の足元で地盤となることは大きな重責だが、このような正義の目的に一丸となって奉仕できるのは誇らしいことだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Opfer der Vielen ebnet den Weg zu einer triumphalen Zukunft für {mf|den Titan, der|die Titanin, die} das {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} schützt. Es ist eine schwere Last, der Boden unter Seinen Füßen zu sein, aber es ist ruhmreich, einem so rechtschaffenen Zweck geschlossen zu dienen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Opfer der Vielen ebnet den Weg zu einer triumphalen Zukunft für {mf|den Titan, der|die Titanin, die} das {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g} schützt. Es ist eine schwere Last, der Boden unter Seinen Füßen zu sein, aber es ist ruhmreich, einem so rechtschaffenen Zweck geschlossen zu dienen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}İmparatorluk'un{/g} Koruyucusu olan o dev için zaferlerle dolu bir geleceğe açılan yol, birçoklarının fedakârlığıyla döşenir. O'nun ayağının altındaki toprak olmak, ağır bir yük. Ancak böylesi ulu bir amaca birliktelikle hizmet etmek ne muazzamdır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The sacrifice of the many paves the way to a triumphant future for the titan that is the Protector of the {g|Encyclopedia:ImperiumGlossary}Imperium{/g}. It is a heavy burden to be the ground beneath His feet, but it is glorious to serve such a righteous purpose in unity.{/n}
